trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as the base class for the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 抽象类用作基类的抽象<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to fill the background of the content area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>用来填充内容区域的背景。

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本的表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to not use a background brush.
trans-unit.target: 用来填充内容区域的背景的画笔或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>不使用背景画笔。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>表示中元素的内容的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A> property is often used to append content to the end of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>属性通常用于将追加到一种<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>末尾的内容</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终为其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref>表示中的内容的末尾<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the start of content in the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>表示元素中的内容的开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A> property is often used to insert content to the beginning of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>属性通常用于插入到的一种<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>开头的内容</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终为其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the start of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"> </xref>表示中的内容的开头<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，表示元素的末尾之后的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref>表示之后的末尾位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>表示的元素的开头之前位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素内容的首选顶级字体系列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>对象指定首选的字体系列，或一个主要首选的字体系列并附带一个或多个备用字体系列。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是通过确定的字体<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的内容的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.
trans-unit.target: 要使用以设备无关的像素为单位，大于 0.001 的所需的字体大小且小于或等于 35791。

trans-unit.source: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值取决于当前的系统设置，并且依赖于<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值。

trans-unit.source: FontSize is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.
trans-unit.target: FontSize 设置为值大于 35791 或小于或等于 0.001。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>结构，它指定所需的字体拉伸特征，以使用。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.

trans-unit.source: Handles notifications that one or more of the dependency properties that exist on the element have had their effective values changed.
trans-unit.target: 处理一个或多个元素存在的依赖项属性，遇到了的有效值更改的通知。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Arguments associated with the property value change.
trans-unit.target: 更改属性值与关联的自变量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property*> property specifies which property has changed, the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue*> property specifies the previous property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*> property specifies the new property value.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 属性指定哪个属性已更改， <> </> *1> 属性指定以前的属性值，与<xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>属性指定新的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>

trans-unit.target: 为其设置的值的依赖对象<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*>

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: 要将属性设置为的新值。

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>附加指定的依赖对象的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> property.
trans-unit.target: 为其设置的值的依赖对象<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: 要将属性设置为的新值。

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于元素的内容的文本效果的集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to `null` and has no <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性设置为`null`和具有没有<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>与其关联。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Before adding any text effects, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> and assign it to this property.
trans-unit.target: 在添加任何文本效果之前, 创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>并将其分配给此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> containing one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"> </xref>包含一个或多个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>定义要应用于此元素中的内容效果的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (not an empty collection).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> （不是空的集合）。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前有效的版式变体的内容的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A> property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A>属性是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant.
trans-unit.target: 版式变体不起上不支持该变体的字体。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 本主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref> object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref>对象，它指定当前有效的版式变体。

trans-unit.source: For a list of default typography values, see <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参阅<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref>。
